name: homebridge-tesvor
author: Marcel Kordek
description: Homebridge Plugin for Tesvor Robot Vacuum

scripts.push:version: npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run push && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run push && npm publish
scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid beta && npm run push && npm publish --tag=beta
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm link && nodemon
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: auto-changelog -p -u && git add CHANGELOG.md && git push --tags
